channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: US Weather Pulls a Switcheroo
item.description: Finally, some snow for the West and warmer temperatures for the East.

item.title: Senators Urge Top Regulator to Stay Out of Prediction Market Lawsuits
item.description: As prediction market platforms like Polymarket and Kalshi battle regulators in court, Senate Democrats are urging the CFTC to avoid weighing in, escalating a broader fight over the burgeoning industry.

item.title: Join Our Livestream: The Hype, Reality, and Future of EVs
item.description: Pose your questions to a panel of WIRED experts about the future of the electric vehicle industry.

item.title: 27 charming lilac home office finds for your dreamy desk set-up
item.description: Create your perfect playful workspace.

item.title: ‘Good Luck, Have Fun, Don’t Die’ Is Way Over the Top and We Love That About It
item.description: Sam Rockwell stars in the manic, poignant sci-fi love letter from director Gore Verbinski.

item.title: Wendy’s is closing hundreds of U.S. restaurants as domestic sales slide
item.description: The fast food burger chain is planning to shut down around 300 stores in 2026, as sales in the U.S. slump. Wendy’s is moving ahead with its plans to close hundreds of restaurants, amounting to between 5 and 6% of its total stores in the U.S., according to its fourth quarter earnings report.

item.title: Have an old Mac, iPhone, or iPad gathering dust? Get down to Best Buy right now to trade it in for generous savings on new Apple products
item.description: If you have an old Apple device lying around, Best Buy is currently offering a trade-in offer that allows you to save big on a brand-new Apple device.

item.title: 7 hidden WhatsApp settings you never knew existed – and why you need to use them
item.description: You can power up WhatsApp by adjusting a few hidden settings – here are 7 of the best changes to make.

item.title: 20 Best Presidents' Day Deals on Gear Our Reviewers Actually Used (2026)
item.description: Shop these limited-time sales to save on some of our favorite gadgets from Branch, Eufy, and more.

item.title: Nearly a million WordPress websites could be at risk from this serious plugin security flaw
item.description: WPvivid Backup & Migration plugin allows for arbitrary file upload which can lead to remote code execution.

item.title: This New York bar hosted an AI dating pop-up where singles matched with chatbots for Valentine’s Day
item.description: At a Manhattan wine bar, singles spent Valentine’s week speed-dating AI companions as surveys show growing interest in chatbot romance. A quarter of those under 30 say they’ve used AI for companionship, according to Associated Press-NORC polling.

item.title: Ben Affleck has one word for AI-generated creative writing. His take on LLMs is going viral
item.description: The Oscar-winning screenwriter shared a few insightful predictions on where filmmaking tech is headed. Could a film industry entirely crafted from AI ever exist? Social media is abuzz with movie scenes made with Seedance 2.0, the latest tech in AI video generation, including everything from a fight scene between Brad Pitt and Tom Cruise to an alternate ending for The Lord of the Rings....

item.title: Record Low Snow in the West Will Mean Less Water, More Fire, and Political Chaos
item.description: Snowpack levels across a wide swath of western US states are among the lowest seen in decades, even as regulators struggle to negotiate water rights in the region.

item.title: Dutch Bros is growing fast. Here’s why its expansion plans matter more than its stock bump
item.description: The fast-growing coffee chain reported double-digit revenue growth and says it’s on track to nearly double its U.S. store count within three years. Starbucks competitor Dutch Bros saw its stock price rise in premarket trading on Friday after the coffee chain posted double-digit revenue growth in its most recent quarter. However, shares were flat as of late morning, with the stock (NYSE: BROS) hovering at just over $50 a share. ...

item.title: The ‘Heated Rivalry’ Fandom Is Tearing Itself Apart
item.description: The breakout hockey romance has sparked legions of enthralled fans, along with obsessive, parasocial behavior that’s starting to get called out.

item.title: These Open Earbuds Are Just Over $20
item.description: Don’t be fooled by a slowly dropping price tag, the Acefit are surprisingly capable.

item.title: Steam beta lets users add their PC specs to reviews
item.description: User reviews on Steam may get more informative after a Steam Client Beta update released on Thursday, which adds an option for users to attach their hardware specs to game reviews. Steam users have always been able to share their specs in the text of their reviews, but the option to automatically include that data […]

item.title: Here are the 50 best Presidents Day deals we’ve found so far
item.description: Deals have been admittedly pretty dry since the holidays, but now that February is in full swing, we’re starting to see strong discounts return across a range of categories. In fact, thanks to Valentine’s Day, the Super Bowl, and — as of this week — Presidents Day, retailers are once again offering a slew of […]

item.title: Grab the lightning-fast Samsung 990 EVO Plus SSD and get a $70 Norton 360 Standard subscription for free this Presidents' Day
item.description: Buy the 1TB Samsung 990 EVO Plus SSD and get $70 Norton 360 Standard subscription for free this President's Day.

item.title: OpenAI removes access to sycophancy-prone GPT-4o model
item.description: The model is known for its overly sycophantic nature and its role in several lawsuits involving users' unhealthy relationships to the chatbot.

item.title: Souveraineté numérique | Québec veut renforcer son indépendance numérique
item.description: La souveraineté numérique du Québec devient une priorité du gouvernement Legault. Son ministre de la Cybersécurité et du Numérique a dévoilé vendredi matin sa volonté de « renforcer l’autonomie numérique de l’État » pour se défaire de « la dépendance envers des fournisseurs étrangers ».

item.title: Apple's Magic Mouse is down to $68 right now
item.description: Apple's USB-C Magic Mouse is back on sale for about $11 off its usual retail price of $79. At $68, that's a savings of 14 percent for one of Apple's best accessories from a company that does not often run sales. The multi-touch mouse was first released in 2009 with a modest refresh released in 2015 and the addition of a USB-C port in 2024. The rechargeable mouse features gesture controls and automatically pairs with your Mac when connected via USB. The Magic Mouse can also be used with an iPad via Bluetooth, or with a Windows PC, though in that case, functionality would be limited. Famously, ...

item.title: Inflation measure drops to a nearly five-year low
item.description: Friday’s report suggests inflation is cooling. A key measure of inflation fell to nearly a five-year low last month as apartment rental price growth slowed and gas prices fell, offering some relief to Americans grappling with the sharp cost increases of the past five years.

item.title: This new 'relentless' Netflix horror series is set to bring my worst nightmare to life — its first unhinged trailer already has me spiralling
item.description: We've not had a horror series on Netflix for a good while, but the streamer is about to change that with the terrifying Something Very Bad is Going to Happen.

item.title: 5 lessons for building up an industry, not just a company
item.description: If your market doesn’t exist yet, here’s how to build it while you’re developing a business.

item.title: 10 Romantically Spooky Horror Movies to Stream for Valentine’s Day
item.description: Get cozy with your favorite scream queen or gore hound this weekend.

item.title: What agentic AI makes possible in healthcar
item.description: From episodic care to predictive health, AI can be the glue in between care.

item.title: The SEC closed its investigation into Fisker
item.description: The financial regulator revealed in a response to a TechCrunch records request that the probe was closed in September 2025.

item.title: Marshall Stanmore III : cette enceinte Bluetooth perd 30 % de son prix, mais pas son style vintage indémodable
item.description: Sédentaire, puissante et toujours aussi stylée, la Marshall Stanmore III est l'une des enceintes Bluetooth les plus intéressantes du catalogue de la marque. Actuellement, la Fnac et Darty la proposent à 279,99 euros au lieu de 399,99 euros.
